message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $200. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your offer, but I can't go lower than $180.  This product is truly top-quality and worth the investment.
I understand that the product is high-quality, but I'm still looking to save some money. How about we meet in the middle at $140?
